calloutBox.title: Friendly Frogs
calloutBox.subTitle: 56 months to 60 months
calloutBox.content: Our Friendly Frogs program has 12 children ranging from approximately 56 months to approximately 60 months old. We have one consistent and nurturing staff member caring for our preschool children daily.

mainContent.title: Program Details
mainContent.content: During their time in the Friendly Frogs classroom, each child is given the opportunity to learn in a preschool rich environment. This experience consists of a morning circle time with calendar and our weekly theme, learning area activities centered around art, more challenging math and science skills, with an emphasis on lowercase letters through Zoophonics and Handwriting Without Tears. Midway through the year, after a full letter review, the class will begin working with word families to begin their easy reading skills. Throughout the year, we continue to improve self help skills in our preparation for Kindergarten Readiness. Our Friendly Frogs classroom is taking one nap a day, playing outdoors twice a day, and enjoying our nutritional menu.
list: Personal cot and storage area provided
Parents provide an extra set of clothes and a cot sheet
Special art and various age development projects
Weekly Bible stories and prayers before each meal
Nutritious breakfast, lunch, and snack provided

boxes.title: Ms. Becky - Lead Teacher
boxes.text: I grew up and still live in Lowell. I attended GRCC for Early Childhood and have been working at Big Steps since 2003. My children, Ava and Kaiden, keep me busy with driving them to dance and baseball, but in my free time I enjoy crafting, watching shows, and camping with my husband and children.

boxes.title: Ms. Darlene
boxes.text: I have been a part of Big Steps since 2006 and have been a cook, van driver, and teacher aide. I tutored children in reading while I went to the Kent Skills Center for my Cosmetology License. My hobbies include enjoying time with my dogs, drawing, and reading. I so blessed to be part of the Big Steps family.
